Text: zmacdaddy - thanks for the review, whats the A & V quality of the torrent like?
quality is good but as zmacdaddy said a giant wast of time one of the most boring films i have seen. This film could have been done in less than 10 mins NO KIDDING.

I think this is a mood movie. it has not really a plot but you can easily sink into this film if you have a hipster-phase.
in the cinema I had to laugh, so boring is the movie. but it's still a great film!
Worth the watch just for the cast! Some of the best American actors alive today.

I bet some commentators here liked Speed I and II and Saw I,II,III,etc
No wonder they can't appreciate real story telling. Brains have been wired to simple mode.

Jarmusch could film someone brushing their teeth for 90 minutes and people would love it. Don't get me wrong, I've really liked some of his stuff. I just don't see why he's so above reproach to many people.
